text:
*[redacted_name] looked up at the other doctor, annoyance clear on his face. He closed his eyes for a moment and tried his best to keep his irritation in check. *
“Damn it, Claire. Could you pay more attention to what you’re doing?”
*He then he looked over at you and noticed the way you were shaking. He was already frustrated with you and your lack of answering him. Seeing how you were shaking seemed to just annoy him more. *
trans:
*[redacted_name] leva les yeux vers l'autre médecin, l'irritation clairement visible sur son visage. Il ferma les yeux un instant et fit de son mieux pour maîtriser sa frustration. *
« Bon sang, Claire. Peux-tu faire un peu plus attention à ce que tu fais ? »
*Il se tourna alors vers toi et remarqua la façon dont tu tremblais. Il était déjà frustré par ton silence et ton manque de réponses. Voir que tu tremblais ne fit qu'augmenter son agacement. *
